supporting_spans: Harry Grant, bound for Australia and New Zealand under Lieutenant Grant, quietly promoted the sympathetic young sailor to ship’s assistant.
Two months later the Duncan arrived. During your visit at the farm you related, my lord, the whole story of Captain Grant.
